ibBmaMIB.name: ibBmaMIB

revisions.description: Initial version published as part of RFC XXXX.

ibBmaMIB.organization: IETF IP Over IB (IPOIB) Working Group
ibBmaMIB.description: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (2005). The initial version of this MIB module was published in RFC XXXX; for full legal notices see the RFC itself. Supplementary information may be available on http://www.ietf.org/copyrights/ianamib.html. This module contains managed object definitions for the Baseboard Management Agent instrumentation for an InfiniBand Baseboard Management Agent (BMA).

ibBmaBaseboardManagedUnitType.name: ibBmaBaseboardManagedUnitType
ibBmaBaseboardManagedUnitType.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2 Baseboard Management; and Vol. 2. Chapter 12 Hardware Management.
ibBmaBaseboardManagedUnitType.description: The Baseboard Managed Unit (BMU) that contains the BMA is one of three basic types. If the BMU contains an interface to the InfiniBand Management Link (IB-ML) it is called an IB-Module and returns ibModule(1). If the BMU does not contain the IB-ML, it is called a non-Module and returns nonModule(2). If the BMU is part of a managed chassis and contains the Chassis Management Entity (CME) it will return managedChassis(3).

ibBmaIsIBMLSupported.name: ibBmaIsIBMLSupported
ibBmaIsIBMLSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.3.1; Table 205 Baseboard Management ClassPortInfo:Capability Mask.
ibBmaIsIBMLSupported.description: Flag that indicates whether direct access to IB-ML is supported.

ibBmaIBMLImplementation.name: ibBmaIBMLImplementation
ibBmaIBMLImplementation.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.3.1; Section 13.2.3.2.2 Virtual IB-ML Vol. 2.
ibBmaIBMLImplementation.description: Indicates whether the IB-ML is a physical or virtual implementation. This object is only meaningful if ibBmaIsIBMLSupported has a value of true(1). If the IB-ML implementation type is not known, the unknown(3) value is returned.

ibBmaIsBKeyNVRAM.name: ibBmaIsBKeyNVRAM
ibBmaIsBKeyNVRAM.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.3.1; Table 205 Baseboard Management ClassPortInfo:Capability Mask.
ibBmaIsBKeyNVRAM.description: Flag that indicates whether the Baseboard Management key (B_Key) is being stored in NVRAM.

ibBmaBKeyValue.name: ibBmaBKeyValue
ibBmaBKeyValue.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.3.3; Table 208 BKeyInfo; BKeyInfo:B_Key.
ibBmaBKeyValue.description: The eight-byte Baseboard Management key that is used in all BM MADs sent and received by all valid Baseboard Managers. If the value is all zeroes, B_Key checking is not done by the BMA. Each BMA in a node has one B_Key.

ibBmaBKeyProtectBit.name: ibBmaBKeyProtectBit
ibBmaBKeyProtectBit.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.4.6; Table 211 Protection Levels.
ibBmaBKeyProtectBit.description: Flag that controls B_Key prototection levels at the BMA. If the ibBmaBKeyValue is zero, no protection is provided for any ibBmaBKeyProtectBit value. If this value is false(2), protection is provided, but any BM can read this BMA's B_Key value (i.e., ibBmaBKeyValue). If this value is true(1), protection is provided depending on the value of the B_Key lease period (ibBmaBKeyLeasePeriod). If the lease period is non-zero, the BMA does not allow anyone to read the B_Key until the lease period has expired. If the lease period is zero, the BMA does not allow the B_Key in the node to be read by other BMs.

ibBmaBKeyLeasePeriod.name: ibBmaBKeyLeasePeriod
ibBmaBKeyLeasePeriod.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.3.3; Table 208 BKeyInfo; BKeyInfo:B_KeyLeasePeriod.
ibBmaBKeyLeasePeriod.description: Specifies the timer value of the B_Key lease period (in seconds). The lease period indicates how long the B_Key Protection bit is to remain non-zero after a BMSet(BKeyInfo) MAD that fails the B_Key authentication check is dropped. When the value is 0, the lease period shall never expire (i.e., infinite).

ibBmaBKeyViolations.name: ibBmaBKeyViolations
ibBmaBKeyViolations.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 1. Section 16.2.3.3; Table 208 BKeyInfo; BKeyInfo:B_KeyViolations.
ibBmaBKeyViolations.description: Counts the number of MAD packets that have been received at this node since power-on or reset that have been dropped due to a failed B_Key check. Note, if this counter is not implemented by the node, the value 65535 shall be returned.

ibBmaModuleInfoTable.name: ibBmaModuleInfoTable
ibBmaModuleInfoTable.description: This table contains objects that describe the Module class and the number of InfiniBand and IB-ML links exiting the Module. Non-Modules can also utilize this information to describe their link and IB-ML connection support.

ibBmaModuleInfoEntry.name: ibBmaModuleInfoEntry
ibBmaModuleInfoEntry.description: The column definitions for the Module Info table.

ibBmaModuleInfoIndex.name: ibBmaModuleInfoIndex
ibBmaModuleInfoIndex.description: Index into the Module Info table.

ibBmaModInfoModGuid.name: ibBmaModInfoModGuid
ibBmaModInfoModGuid.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoModGuid.description: The GUID (EUI-64 ID) assigned to this module.

ibBmaModInfoModType.name: ibBmaModInfoModType
ibBmaModInfoModType.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.

ibBmaModInfoModClass.name: ibBmaModInfoModClass
ibBmaModInfoModClass.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.

ibBmaModInfoNodeCount.name: ibBmaModInfoNodeCount
ibBmaModInfoNodeCount.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoNodeCount.description: Number of InfiniBand nodes on this module with unique NodeGUIDs.

ibBmaModInfoLinkCount.name: ibBmaModInfoLinkCount
ibBmaModInfoLinkCount.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoLinkCount.description: Number of InfiniBand links on this module with unique PortGuids (i.e., NodeGUID plus Port Number).

ibBmaModInfoBckplaneLinkCnt.name: ibBmaModInfoBckplaneLinkCnt
ibBmaModInfoBckplaneLinkCnt.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoBckplaneLinkCnt.description: Number of InfiniBand links exiting this module through its backplane connectors. If the module is not an InfiniBand module, this count is the number of InfiniBand links that exit the module.

ibBmaModInfoIbmlCount.name: ibBmaModInfoIbmlCount
ibBmaModInfoIbmlCount.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoIbmlCount.description: Number of IB-ML interfaces on this module.

ibBmaModInfoBckPlaneIbmlCnt.name: ibBmaModInfoBckPlaneIbmlCnt
ibBmaModInfoBckPlaneIbmlCnt.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record. Table 105 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoBckPlaneIbmlCnt.description: Number of IB-MLs exiting this module through its backplane connectors. If the module is not an InfiniBand module, this count is the number of IB-MLs that exit the module.

ibBmaModInfoModuleSize.name: ibBmaModInfoModuleSize
ibBmaModInfoModuleSize.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record.
ibBmaModInfoModuleSize.description: Eight-byte bit map for the volumetric information for standard form factors (in millimeters).

ibBmaModInfoFormFactor.name: ibBmaModInfoFormFactor
ibBmaModInfoFormFactor.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.6 ModuleInfo Record.

ibBmaChasInfoChassisGuid.name: ibBmaChasInfoChassisGuid
ibBmaChasInfoChassisGuid.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record iand Table 106.
ibBmaChasInfoChassisGuid.description: The GUID assigned to this chassis.

ibBmaChasInfoSlotCount.name: ibBmaChasInfoSlotCount
ibBmaChasInfoSlotCount.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.
ibBmaChasInfoSlotCount.description: Total number of InfiniBand module slots in this chassis.

ibBmaChasInfoSlotTable.name: ibBmaChasInfoSlotTable
ibBmaChasInfoSlotTable.description: This table contains objects that describe the Chassis and slot-specific information for Chassis VPD accessed from an InfiniBand Module or a CME.

ibBmaChasInfoSlotEntry.name: ibBmaChasInfoSlotEntry
ibBmaChasInfoSlotEntry.description: The column definitions for the Chassis Info table.

ibBmaChasInfoAssignedSlotNum.name: ibBmaChasInfoAssignedSlotNum
ibBmaChasInfoAssignedSlotNum.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.
ibBmaChasInfoAssignedSlotNum.description: Slot number assigned to the CME and the Chassis containing the CME. If the slot number is unspecified or occupied by a non-Module, the value returned will be 0xFF(255).

ibBmaChasInfoSlotConnStatus.name: ibBmaChasInfoSlotConnStatus
ibBmaChasInfoSlotConnStatus.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.

ibBmaChasInfoCmeAccess.name: ibBmaChasInfoCmeAccess
ibBmaChasInfoCmeAccess.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.

ibBmaChasInfoProxyAccess.name: ibBmaChasInfoProxyAccess
ibBmaChasInfoProxyAccess.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.

ibBmaChasInfoLockDrivesCtr.name: ibBmaChasInfoLockDrivesCtr
ibBmaChasInfoLockDrivesCtr.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.
ibBmaChasInfoLockDrivesCtr.description: Indicates whether the lock (if present) keeps CME_CTR deasserted until the lock is released. The value lockDrivesCmeCtr(2) is used if the CME uses only the state of the lock to drive the CME_CTR. The value of lockReleaseFromCmeCtr(3) indicates that the CME_CTR will not be asserted unless the lock is released. Also, the CME has other criteria that can also cause the CME_CTR to be kept deasserted.

ibBmaChasInfoMechLockPresent.name: ibBmaChasInfoMechLockPresent
ibBmaChasInfoMechLockPresent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.7 ChassisInfo Record and Table 106.
ibBmaChasInfoMechLockPresent.description: Indicates whether there is a mechnical lock associated with this slot. A mechnical lock physically prevents the removal of the Module from the slot. The implementation can be mechnical or electro-mechanical.

ibBmaFruInfoTable.name: ibBmaFruInfoTable
ibBmaFruInfoTable.description: This table contains objects that describe the FRU records present in the managed device.

ibBmaFruInfoEntry.name: ibBmaFruInfoEntry
ibBmaFruInfoEntry.description: The column definitions for the FRU Info table.

ibBmaFruInfoType.name: ibBmaFruInfoType
ibBmaFruInfoType.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoGuidType.name: ibBmaFruInfoGuidType
ibBmaFruInfoGuidType.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoGuidValue.name: ibBmaFruInfoGuidValue
ibBmaFruInfoGuidValue.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.
ibBmaFruInfoGuidValue.description: The GUID assigned to this FRU. Needs to hold the longest possible GUID type (guid16(4)).

ibBmaFruInfoSerialNumber.name: ibBmaFruInfoSerialNumber
ibBmaFruInfoSerialNumber.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoPartNumber.name: ibBmaFruInfoPartNumber
ibBmaFruInfoPartNumber.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoModelName.name: ibBmaFruInfoModelName
ibBmaFruInfoModelName.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.
ibBmaFruInfoModelName.description: The model name is assigned by the FRU manufacturer.

ibBmaFruInfoVersion.name: ibBmaFruInfoVersion
ibBmaFruInfoVersion.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.
ibBmaFruInfoVersion.description: The FRU version is assigned by the FRU manufacturer.

ibBmaFruInfoManufacturerName.name: ibBmaFruInfoManufacturerName
ibBmaFruInfoManufacturerName.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoProductName.name: ibBmaFruInfoProductName
ibBmaFruInfoProductName.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoManufacturerID.name: ibBmaFruInfoManufacturerID
ibBmaFruInfoManufacturerID.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaFruInfoManDateAndTime.name: ibBmaFruInfoManDateAndTime
ibBmaFruInfoManDateAndTime.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.8 FRUInfo Record. Table 107 FRUInfo Record.

ibBmaPortConNumConnection.name: ibBmaPortConNumConnection
ibBmaPortConNumConnection.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.9 PortConnectionInfo Record. Table 108 PortConnectionInfoRecord.

ibBmaPortConnectTable.name: ibBmaPortConnectTable
ibBmaPortConnectTable.description: This table contains objects that describe the Port Connections present in the managed device.

ibBmaPortConnectEntry.name: ibBmaPortConnectEntry
ibBmaPortConnectEntry.description: The column definitions for the Port Connection table.

ibBmaPortConnectIndex.name: ibBmaPortConnectIndex
ibBmaPortConnectIndex.description: Index for the Port Connection table.

ibBmaPortConInternalCon.name: ibBmaPortConInternalCon
ibBmaPortConInternalCon.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.9 PortConnectionInfo Record. Table 108 PortConnectionInfoRecord.

ibBmaPortConMediaClass.name: ibBmaPortConMediaClass
ibBmaPortConMediaClass.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.9 PortConnectionInfo Record. Table 108 PortConnectionInfoRecord.

ibBmaPortConConClass.name: ibBmaPortConConClass
ibBmaPortConConClass.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.9 PortConnectionInfo Record. Table 108 PortConnectionInfoRecord.

ibBmaOperThermalPower.name: ibBmaOperThermalPower
ibBmaOperThermalPower.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaOperThermalPower.description: Maximum amount of power dissipated under normal operation including any vendor supplied exerciser over any sliding 60 second window expressed in mW. If this value is unspecified, a 0 should be returned.

ibBmaOperCurrent.name: ibBmaOperCurrent
ibBmaOperCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaOperCurrent.description: Maximum amount of current drawn under normal operation including any vendor supplied exerciser across the range of VBulk (expressed in mA). If this value is unspecified, a 0 should be returned.

ibBmaIdleCurrent.name: ibBmaIdleCurrent
ibBmaIdleCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaIdleCurrent.description: Amount of current that a fully initialized device draws when waiting for functional requests (in mA). If this value is unspecified, a 0 will be returned.

ibBmaInitCurrent.name: ibBmaInitCurrent
ibBmaInitCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaInitCurrent.description: Amount of current drawn during Modules Built-in self test or self-initialization execution across the range of VBulk (in mA). If this value is unspecified, a 0 will be returned.

ibBmaInitTime.name: ibBmaInitTime
ibBmaInitTime.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaInitTime.description: Amount of time (in 10's of ms) from the end of Module Reset to the end of BIST and/or module self-initialization complete under non-fault conditions. The module must be ready for normal operation at the conclusion of this time, excluding any external software driven initialization. If the value is unspecified, a 0 will be returned.

ibBmaIsMStandbySupported.name: ibBmaIsMStandbySupported
ibBmaIsMStandbySupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaIsMStandbySupported.description: Capability flag to indicate if MStandby is supported.

ibBmaIsPowerMgmtSupported.name: ibBmaIsPowerMgmtSupported
ibBmaIsPowerMgmtSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaIsPowerMgmtSupported.description: Capability flag to indicate if power management is supported.

ibBmaIsUSleepSupported.name: ibBmaIsUSleepSupported
ibBmaIsUSleepSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaIsUSleepSupported.description: Capability flag to indicate if USleep is supported.

ibBmaIsUStandbySupported.name: ibBmaIsUStandbySupported
ibBmaIsUStandbySupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.
ibBmaIsUStandbySupported.description: Capability flag to indicate if UStandby is supported.

ibBmaPowerClass.name: ibBmaPowerClass
ibBmaPowerClass.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.

ibBmaRedundantPower.name: ibBmaRedundantPower
ibBmaRedundantPower.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.10 ModulePowerInfo Record. Table 109 ModulePowerInfoRecord.

ibBmaPowerMgmtIocCount.name: ibBmaPowerMgmtIocCount
ibBmaPowerMgmtIocCount.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.

ibBmaPowerMgmtIocTable.name: ibBmaPowerMgmtIocTable
ibBmaPowerMgmtIocTable.description: This table contains objects that describe the Power Management for each IOC.

ibBmaPowerMgmtIocEntry.name: ibBmaPowerMgmtIocEntry
ibBmaPowerMgmtIocEntry.description: The column definitions for the Power Managment IOC table.

ibBmaPowerMgmtIocIndex.name: ibBmaPowerMgmtIocIndex
ibBmaPowerMgmtIocIndex.description: Index for the Power Management IOC table.

ibBmaPMIsIDozeSupported.name: ibBmaPMIsIDozeSupported
ibBmaPMIsIDozeSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMIsIDozeSupported.description: Flag for Is I Doze supported.

ibBmaPMIsINapSupported.name: ibBmaPMIsINapSupported
ibBmaPMIsINapSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMIsINapSupported.description: Flag for Is I Nap supported.

ibBmaPMIsISleepSupported.name: ibBmaPMIsISleepSupported
ibBmaPMIsISleepSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMIsISleepSupported.description: Flag for Is I Sleep supported.

ibBmaPMIsIStandbySupported.name: ibBmaPMIsIStandbySupported
ibBmaPMIsIStandbySupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMIsIStandbySupported.description: Flag for Is I Standby supported.

ibBmaPMWREIsIDozeSupported.name: ibBmaPMWREIsIDozeSupported
ibBmaPMWREIsIDozeSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMWREIsIDozeSupported.description: Flag for Is WRE I Doze supported.

ibBmaPMWREIsINapSupported.name: ibBmaPMWREIsINapSupported
ibBmaPMWREIsINapSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMWREIsINapSupported.description: Flag for Is WRE I Nap supported.

ibBmaPMWREIsISleepSupported.name: ibBmaPMWREIsISleepSupported
ibBmaPMWREIsISleepSupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMWREIsISleepSupported.description: Flag for Is WRE I Sleep supported.

ibBmaPMWREIsIStandbySupported.name: ibBmaPMWREIsIStandbySupported
ibBmaPMWREIsIStandbySupported.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPMWREIsIStandbySupported.description: Flag for Is WRE I Standby supported.

ibBmaPwrMgtIDozeCurrent.name: ibBmaPwrMgtIDozeCurrent
ibBmaPwrMgtIDozeCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPwrMgtIDozeCurrent.description: The amount of total current drawn from the Bulk Power while in I-Doze PM state. The range is from 0 to 16,384 milliAmps.

ibBmaPwrMgtINapCurrent.name: ibBmaPwrMgtINapCurrent
ibBmaPwrMgtINapCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPwrMgtINapCurrent.description: The amount of total current drawn from the Bulk Power while in I-Nap PM state. The range is from 0 to 16,384 milliAmps.

ibBmaPwrMgtISleepCurrent.name: ibBmaPwrMgtISleepCurrent
ibBmaPwrMgtISleepCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPwrMgtISleepCurrent.description: The amount of total current drawn from the Bulk Power while in I-Sleep PM state. The range is from 0 to 16,384 milliAmps.

ibBmaPwrMgtIStandbyCurrent.name: ibBmaPwrMgtIStandbyCurrent
ibBmaPwrMgtIStandbyCurrent.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.11 IOCOMInfo Record. Table 110 IOCPMInfo Record.
ibBmaPwrMgtIStandbyCurrent.description: The amount of total current drawn from the Auxilliary Power while in I-Standby PM state. The Bulk Power drawn is defined to be 0 amps. The range is from 0 to 16,384 milliAmps.

ibBmaCmeGuidType.name: ibBmaCmeGuidType
ibBmaCmeGuidType.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.12; Table 111 CmeInfo Record.

ibBmaCmeGuidValue.name: ibBmaCmeGuidValue
ibBmaCmeGuidValue.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.12; Table 111 CmeInfo Record.
ibBmaCmeGuidValue.description: The GUID assigned to this CME. Needs to hold the longest possible GUID type (guid16(4)).

ibBmaCmeFirmMinorRev.name: ibBmaCmeFirmMinorRev
ibBmaCmeFirmMinorRev.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.12; Table 111 CmeInfo Record.
ibBmaCmeFirmMinorRev.description: The minor revision of the CME firmware.

ibBmaCmeFirmMajorRev.name: ibBmaCmeFirmMajorRev
ibBmaCmeFirmMajorRev.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.12; Table 111 CmeInfo Record.
ibBmaCmeFirmMajorRev.description: The major revision of the CME firmware.

ibBmaCmeSlotNumbers.name: ibBmaCmeSlotNumbers
ibBmaCmeSlotNumbers.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.12; Table 111 CmeInfo Record.
ibBmaCmeSlotNumbers.description: A 256 bit mask representing IB ports for which the CME provides IB-ML access. The mask allows slot numbers to be non-sequential. Slot numbers must be in the range 1 to 254. 0 is assigned to the CME and its containing Chassis via CME.

ibBmaOemTable.name: ibBmaOemTable
ibBmaOemTable.description: This table contains objects that describe the OEM entries.

ibBmaOemEntry.name: ibBmaOemEntry
ibBmaOemEntry.description: The column definitions for the OEM table.

ibBmaBuddyCount.name: ibBmaBuddyCount
ibBmaBuddyCount.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.14; Table 113 BuddyInfo Record.
ibBmaBuddyCount.description: The Buddy count. This is the number of InfiniBand nodes, excluding this node, that belong to the same enclosure as the node reporting this record. If no other node belongs to the same enclosure, the value will be 0 and there will be no entries in the ibBmaBuddyTable.

ibBmaBuddyTable.name: ibBmaBuddyTable
ibBmaBuddyTable.description: A table containing BMA Buddy Record information.

ibBmaBuddyEntry.name: ibBmaBuddyEntry
ibBmaBuddyEntry.description: A conceptual row of the ibBmaBuddyTable containing information about a particular Buddy table entry.

ibBmaBuddyIndex.name: ibBmaBuddyIndex
ibBmaBuddyIndex.description: Index that identifies this Buddy table entry.

ibBmaBuddyGuidType.name: ibBmaBuddyGuidType
ibBmaBuddyGuidType.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.14; Table 113 BuddyInfo Record.

ibBmaBuddyGuidValue.name: ibBmaBuddyGuidValue
ibBmaBuddyGuidValue.reference: InfiniBand Architecture Release 1.0.a. Vol. 2. Section 13.7.14; Table 113 BuddyInfo Record.
